description:
What's the most challenging aspect of Spanish grammar? Many would answer: the subjunctive.

This course is designed specifically to help you learn this important aspect of Spanish grammar.

The course covers what the subjunctive is, how to conjugate it, and how to actually use it when speaking or writing.

PDF worksheets in the course clearly lay out the different rules and forms of the subjunctive and also include various examples and exercises for students to practice, practice, practice. There are answer keys included as well, plus explanations from the teacher.

This course is a good match for intermediate level Spanish students who are interested in perfecting their understanding of the subjunctive.
title: Spanish Subjunctive: Learn Spanish Grammar Easy
